Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd

Class PubCommandProcessFactory

java.lang.Object
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.PubCommandProcessFactory
public final class PubCommandProcessFactory extends Object
A factory that build Process that running PubSubCommand to local machine.
This factory will fetch WILLPUB_OPIUM_DART_FLUTTER_EXEC values when first execution of getInstance(). The environment variable should be like this:
(path_to_dart_executable);([optional] path_to_flutter_executable)
It should be done absolutely nothing when getting Flutter from git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable and set argument with above steps. Otherwise, it required renaming back to dart and flutter for representing SDK function.
To execute subcommand, please refer to buildPubProcess(File, boolean, PubSubCommand)'s steps.
Since:
1.0.0

    • buildPubProcess

      public Process buildPubProcess(@Nonnull File projectDir, boolean runFlutter, @Nonnull PubSubCommand subcommand) throws IOException
      Build Process for executing PubSubCommand under given projectDir.

      Returned process is started already, and you may need to apply BufferedReader and BufferedWriter for continue interacting between PubSubCommand and Java program itself.

      Example for building process

           // Get factory's instance
     PubCommandProcessFactory f = getInstance();

     // Apply new pub process
     Process p = f.buildPubProcess(
              new File("/path/to/project"),
              false, // `true` if Flutter project.
              new PubPublishSubCommand().addOption(new PubDryRunOption()) // Any subcommand
     );

     // Buffered reader for buffer execution output of pub command.
     BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(p.getInputStream()));

     // Buffered writer for buffer incoming input argument to pub command.
     BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(p.getOutputStream()));

     // Buffered error for buffer error message output of pub command.
     BufferedReader errReader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(p.getErrorStream()));

     // Handle buffers below...
      Parameters:
      projectDir - An absolute File that using to execute under project's directory.
      runFlutter - Execute pub with Flutter execution instead of Dart one (required Flutter executable path provided).
      subcommand - Execute which PubSubCommand under this Process.
      Returns:
      A running Process that ready to attach BufferedReader and BufferedWriter for further interaction.
      Throws:
      IOException - When given project directory is not is absolute or directory, try to run Flutter without given Flutter executable or I/O error which throw from ProcessBuilder.start().

    • getInstance

      @Nonnull public static PubCommandProcessFactory getInstance()
      Return instance of PubCommandProcessFactory. If no previous call, the instance will be constructed automatically.
      Returns:
      Instance of PubCommandProcessFactory.
